document.full_text: david wright's offensive production was the centerpiece of a comeback victory as the mets beat the florida marlins for their first victory of the season.
document.title: mets 6, marlins 4 (10 innings): it's early, but mets show a flair for late dramatics
lines_and_colors: david wright's offensive production was the centerpiece of a comeback victory as the mets beat the florida marlins for their first victory of the season.
